resources.string: Whether or not the configured Cyoob size is even used
The configured Cyoob size, set to 1.00 for normal size
Whether or not to let the hitbox size change along with the Cyoob size, turning this on will disable scores!
If you turn this on, Qosmetics will never use the custom bombs that come with a Cyoob
If you turn this on, Qosmetics will never use the custom debris that come with a Cyoob
With this turned on, Cyoob reflections will always be disabled
With this turned on, if a Cyoob has no reflective options it'll keep the default reflections the base game has
